meta.title: About Us – Vive Credit
meta.description: Learn about Vive Credit's story and how we're transforming the NBFI industry through technology, transparency, and 100% digital processes.

about.headline: Technology, transparency, and trust.
about.headlineHighlight: This is the future of lending.
about.intro: Vive Credit was created with a simple goal: to provide a fair, fast, and completely digital financial experience. We eliminate bureaucracy, simplify processes, and put financial control in people's hands — exactly where it should be.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.text: No hidden costs, no surprises. All information is clear, accurate, and easy to understand.

tech.title: Modern Technology
tech.text: Smart algorithms, automated scoring, and online verifications in seconds.

speed.title: Speed & Simplicity
speed.text: Fully digital process — apply in minutes, get instant decision, no unnecessary trips.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We aim to redefine the NBFI industry through speed, technology, and respect for clients. We believe in a world where access to financing is simple, secure, and fair for everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To become the industry standard in digitalization, risk analysis, and customer experience — delivering a modern and human lending process.

evolution.title: Official Launch
evolution.text: The first fully digital NBFI platform, built for speed and simplicity.

evolution.title: Automated Scoring
evolution.text: Implementation of AI engine for real-time risk assessment.

evolution.title: Open Banking Integration
evolution.text: Direct connection to bank accounts for instant verification and fully digital process.

terms.headline: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: This document establishes the terms and conditions of use for the Vive Credit platform, a digital lending service offered electronically. Continued use of the platform represents your agreement to these terms.

definitions.title: 1. Definitions
definitions.text: "Platform" means the Vive Credit website and applications.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.text: To apply for a loan, the user must be at least 18 years old and provide real, complete, and up-to-date information.

process.title: 3. Lending Process
items: Decision transmission via email and customer account

responsibilities.title: 4. User Responsibilities
items: Not use the platform for fraudulent purposes
Repay the loan according to the schedule received upon approval

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: Vive Credit makes every effort for the correct operation of the platform, but cannot guarantee continuous and uninterrupted operation due to independent reasons.

modifications.title: 6. Modifications
modifications.text: We reserve the right to modify the terms, with user notification via email or on the platform.

privacy.headline: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains how Vive Credit collects, uses, and protects your personal data in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR).

purpose.title: 2. Purpose of Collection
purpose.text: Processing loan applications, AML/KYC verification, scoring, contracting, and account-related communications.

retention.title: 4. Storage Period
retention.text: Data is retained in accordance with financial and accounting legislation: between 5 and 10 years.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.text: Data is encrypted, stored in secure environments, and protected through strict anti-fraud procedures.
